Headline: #147 Outer DuSable Lake Shore Express Temporary Reroute near Howard/Rogers
ShortDescription: 147 Outer DuSable Lake Shore Exp buses temp. rerouted SB Howard, Clark, Touhy, Sheridan; NB Sheridan, Touhy, Clark, Rogers due to construction at Howard/Rogers

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#147 Outer DuSable Lake Shore Express buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions near Howard/Rogers, due to construction.

Southbound buses will operate via Howard, Clark, Touhy, Sheridan.

Northbound buses will operate via Sheridan, Touhy, Clark, Rogers.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: 95th-bound-bound Red Line Delays
ShortDescription: 95th-bound-bound Red Line trains are running w/residual delays following an earlier mechanical problem at Harrison. Service is resuming, allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
95th-bound-bound Red Line trains are running w/residual delays following an earlier mechanical problem at Harrison.

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.
